titleStmt.title: The state of the Church of Englande laide open in a conference betweene Diotrephes a bishop, Tertullus a papist, Demetrius an vsurer, Pandocheus an in-keeper, and Paule a preacher of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Udall, John, 1560?-1592.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The state of the Church of England.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
